name: DudeLee Twist
description:
Are you ready to relax and play with DudeLee Twist?
The new and addicting twist and match three or more puzzle?

Do not forget to try our other favorite DudeLee games!

Features:

* Multiple difficulty levels for beginners and pros.
* Smooth: Intuitive controls, a clean interface, and a silky-smooth frame rate!
* Addicting: Easy to learn, yet hard to master gameplay keeps you coming back for more!
* Game Center to share and compete
* Universal application for your iPhone/iPad/iPod
* Polished gameplay
* Hint system
